description: A calm and peaceful musician, fan of Swedish pop who is the exact opposite of his alter-ego Johannes Krauser II, leader of the Death Metal band DMC. Ashamed of his true job, Negishi must cope with DMC`s rising fame while keeping it a secret from friends and family. While performing as Krauser, Negishi proves to be a skilled guitarist, able to play just with his teeth.
name: Negishi Souichi
